intro: Funckia albicans, commonly known as the white funckia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its striking white, trumpet-shaped flowers. The plant features strap-like, narrow leaves that are typically bright green. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Funckia albicans is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a houseplant.
